embeds.title: Battle of the Dragon Information
embeds.description:
> **Duration**: 45 minutes
> **Frequency**: Once a week. Every Friday.
> **Alternate Names**: Dragon Battle, BotD, BOD, Dragon
> **Event Type**: Player/Alliance/Server/Cross Server
> **Note**:
*Duration of Event*: 45 minutes
*Max number of participants*: 30 players per alliance

fields.name: Sign Ups
fields.value:
R5 and R4s can register the alliance for this event
Alliance leaders will choose the time that the event takes place from the options of: 01:00, 07:00, 13:00 or 17:00 UTC
Once the time is selected you have till reset (0:00 UTC) to select which members will participate
Up to 30 members can participate in the event
You must be added by R5 or an R4 to the event in order to join

fields.name: The Battle
fields.value:
This event is alliance versus alliance and matching is based on the total power signed up for the event in each alliance.
Win rate and total number of players may also factor into the matchmaking
To enter the event you must be on your server's mainland (not in burning lands!) and all your troops must be in your castle!
You enter the event by going to the Battle of Dragons tab in the event page (the horn icon) and tapping on the “Enter” button.
If you are not signed up, you cannot enter

Once in, the two alliances will battle over different buildings to gain points. The winning alliance will be the alliance with the most points at the end of the event.
The event lasts for 45 minutes
Each building is set to a time delay and can only be attacked once a certain amount of time has passed
You can attack enemy castles and troops but gain no points for this
If ported, any troops in a building will be removed
You must hold a building for a total of one minute to occupy it

fields.name: Points
fields.value:
Based on what buildings you hold and how long you hold them
Some buildings provide bonus points for first occupation
Buildings:
Level 1 Gold Mine: 300 points per minute.
Level 2 Gold Mine: 600 points per minute.
Level 3 Gold Mine: 1500 points per minute.
Portal: 900 points per minute.
Fortress: 900 points per minute.
Temple: 1500 points per minute.
Dragon Summon Stone: 2100 points per minute.
Dragon Valley: 2400 points per minute.
Dragon Roars Terrace: 1800 points per minute.
The Spring of Rebirth: 1800 points per minute.
Sacred Dragon Palace: 9000 points per minute.

First occupation bonuses:
Level 1 Gold Mine: 500 points.
Level 2 Gold Mine: 1000 points.
Level 3 Gold Mine: 2000 points.

fields.name: Building Buffs
fields.value:
Temple: +15% siege damage and defense.
The Spring of Rebirth: +250% recovery speed.
Dragon Roar Terrace: -60 seconds occupy time

fields.name: Building Opening Times
fields.value:
0 to 3 minutes: Prep time, this is when you port into the Dragon battle land
3 minutes: Level 1 Gold Mines, Portals, and Fortresses open
8 minutes: Temples, Spring of Rebirth, and Dragon Roars Terrace open
13 minutes: Level 2 Gold Mines open
18 minutes: Dragon Valleys and Dragon Summon Stones open
23 minutes: Level 3 Gold Mines open
28 minutes: Sacred Dragon Palace opens

fields.name: Embassy Recommendation
fields.value:
Make sure to only sign up if you can make it, the number of players matters a lot!
Focus on occupation of buildings, combat between castles gives no points and wastes resources
Focus on high point buildings and buildings with buffs; fighting over level 1 gold mines once other buildings are open is pointless
Make sure everyone gets 100,000 individual points for full rewards!
